title: frame issues
body: So ive been running into frame issues recently, ive tried repairing the client and ive tried uninstalling and reinstalling, and nothing seems to work. my frames in are completely fucked up. its capped at 60, even though i have it selected as uncapped, and i know my computer can get much higher performance, and if i turn vsync on it completely freezes my computer. even with it off, i get random moments where i drop to ~17 frames, making the game nigh unplayable. i have no clue how to fix this

replies.body: Reinstalling could certainly help with bad game files that's slowing you down, but it also sounds like your PC could just be too good.  Check out the [high end pc ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs) guide to help with troubleshooting.  Keep in mind you may actually need to cap your fps in-game.  Hope it helps!
